Abstract: Hitting down on the ball and opening your stance a bit are two tips for improving one of golf’s deceptively difficult shots.
Snippet: Hitting down on the ball and opening your stance a bit are two tips for improving one of golf’s deceptively difficult shots.
LeadParagraph: While I was asking people to describe the hardest shot in golf, several top golf teachers instead wanted to talk about the shot that recreational golfers misplay most often, which is not the same thing, even if it is related.
